textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!Get_Existing_Lead.Name},


we have received the information provided and we are preparing the contract for you.

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyCC
textTemplates.text:
Ciao {!$Record.FirstName} {!$Record.LastName},

We would like to do a video call with you to understand your requests.

When are you available to chat?

Here the link to book the call!

https://calendly.com/fabiodexsrl


After the video call, you will receive a proposal made especially for your event, with each service separate so you can decide at the end what you plan to keep.

We still have availability for that date. In order to establish a budget, we need more details, such as: 

• Hours of all the wedding day

• Location

• No. Days of party 

• No. Guests 

• No. environments where the music (eg area aperitifs/ /Dinner and dance), and especially to know if they are different areas.

• know if there will be a ceremony on site 

• know if you have a wedding planner

• know if there are other artists or if you are looking for these

• know if there will be other productions audio / lighting or if you are looking for this

• which theme have you chosen 

• which vendors have you chosen until now and who they are

• from which country you came from and where you find our contact


Here you can find our illustrated catalog for fabiodex’s sound design production.


Waiting for these details  you can see our events on Instagram and Youtube .


Thanks 

Sabrinna Carvalho 

Fabiodex’s personal assistant

textTemplates.name: EmailSubject
textTemplates.text: {!$Organization.Name}: Thank you for your inquiry
